description:
Executive Assistant ($90k-$100k)

An innovative consulting firm located in Los Angeles seeks a proactive, detail-oriented, and professional Executive Assistant to join their dynamic team.

Role Overview:
The chosen candidate will directly support one busy executive and provide backup support for an additional executive as needed. Duties include managing calendars, coordinating heavy travel, preparing expense reports, assisting with correspondence, depositing checks, ordering supplies, handling printing and filing, and more.

Perks are plentiful and will encompass:
  • Competitive base salary
  • Discretionary bonus
  • Great benefits, including full medical and dental coverage, and 401k match
  • Paid time off
  • Gym access, paid parking, and more!


Kindly note, this is a fully onsite role, reporting to both firm locations in Brentwood and El Segundo. Hours will be 8:30am-5:30pm, with on-call availability required when the executive is traveling.

Qualified candidates will have 3-5+ years of Executive Assistant experience within professional services.

Please apply today if interested and qualified!
benefits: Competitive base salary, Discretionary bonus, Great benefits, including full medical and dental coverage, and 401k match, Paid time off, Gym access, paid parking, and more!
